      • deleteContents

        public static int deleteContents(java.io.File targetFile)
        Recursively delete the contents of targetFile, but not the targetFile itself.

        If the targetFile does not exist or it is not a directory, return 0.

        Parameters:
        targetFile - file to delete.
        Returns:
        the total number of files deleted

        WARN: this operation cannot be reverted.

        Parameters:
        path - absolute path value
